## CodeBuilderOptions.theme property

Syntax highlighting theme to use (default: `"dracula"`<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
theme?: string;
```

## Remarks

Common themes include `"dracula"`<!-- -->, `"monokai"`<!-- -->, `"github-light"`<!-- -->, `"nord"`<!-- -->. Uses Shiki for syntax highlighting under the hood.
